analysis.key_quote: Implementing at-will employment (aka the ability to fire anyone at anytime for any reason) for federal workers, especially citing "ignoring presidential directives" as a means for firing, is a blatant, corrupt, power grab that will destroy our country's infrastructure that we've built up and fine tuned for hundreds of years.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by describing it as a corrupt power grab that threatens the integrity of the federal workforce and the country's infrastructure, indicating strong concerns about politicization and the erosion of due process rights.
